title: US Open tennis 2025: Gauff, Sinner and Osaka in action on day seven – live
summary: Katy Murrells is providing ongoing updates from the third round of matches at Flushing Meadows. Fans can follow her reporting for the latest results and highlights. Stay tuned for real-time coverage of the tournament.

title: England v Samoa: Women’s Rugby World Cup 2025 – live
summary: Daniel Gallan provides a live update as the hosts face Samoa in their second Pool A match. Follow the minute-by-minute report for the latest developments from the game. Stay tuned for key highlights and moments.

title: Leeds v Newcastle: Premier League – live
summary: Scott Murray provides live updates from Elland Road as Newcastle aims for their first league victory of the season. Fans can follow the action minute-by-minute. Stay tuned for real-time developments in the match.

title: McKinley Hunt’s double for Canada helps knock Wales out of Rugby World Cup
summary: Canada secured a dominant 42-0 victory over Wales, scoring six tries, while Scotland earned a 29-15 win against Fiji. Both teams advanced to the quarterfinals of the Women's Rugby World Cup as a result of their performances. These wins highlight the competitive nature of the tournament as teams vie for the championship.

title: Manchester United 3-2 Burnley, Tottenham 0-1 Bournemouth: Premier League, EFL and more
summary: Emillia Hawkins provides updates on various football matches across the Premier League, EFL, Bundesliga, and more. Tune in for the latest scores and highlights. Stay informed about the ongoing action in football leagues.
